10:
T = int(input())
    for i in range(T):
        N = int(input())
        print((N*(N-1))//2)
17:
n = int(input())
    watchmen = []
    for i in range(n):
        x, y = map(int, input().split())
        watchmen.append((x, y))

    count = 0
    for i in range(n):
        for j in range(i + 1, n):
            if abs(watchmen[i][0] - watchmen[j][0]) + abs(watchmen[i][1] - watchmen[j][1]) == \
                    ((watchmen[i][0] - watchmen[j][0]) ** 2 + (watchmen[i][1] - watchmen[j][1]) ** 2) ** 0.5:
                count += 1

    print(count)
